document.masterDocTitle: The Ammophilini Wasps of the Genera Eremnophila MENKE, Eremochares GRIBODO, Hoplammophila de BEAUMONT, Parapsammophila TASCHENBERG and Podalonia FERNALD of the " Biologiezentrum Linz " - Collection in Linz, Austria, (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Sphecidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Ammophilini Wasps of the Genera Eremnophila MENKE, Eremochares GRIBODO, Hoplammophila de BEAUMONT, Parapsammophila TASCHENBERG and Podalonia FERNALD of the " Biologiezentrum Linz " - Collection in Linz, Austria, (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Sphecidae)

paragraph.heading:
Podalonia caucasica (MOCSÁRY 1883)
(compared with det. Kohl, NHMW) 58, 48

subSubSection.paragraph:
This species is very similar to
Podalonia affinis
, especially females cannot always be separated with certainty!
